name: Afandas Survival
description:
Afandas Survival is an open world survival game. After a plague wipes out most of the population, you're one of the few survivors on an island called Afanda.
Already at the beginning you realize that surviving isn´t easy. To stay alive, you must search for equipment and provisions. To make life easier watch out for recipes to enhance your crafting skills.
Hunger isn’t the only threat awaiting you on Afandas. Danger is all around you. Be it in form of wild animals, walking dead or other players where you can never know is it a friend or a foe. Are you gonna make it?

Features:
- interactions with the environment
- inventory and equipment system
- body health system
- big Island
- crafting system
- extendable base building System
- various weapons
- individual character creation
- day/night cycle
